Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near Rhodes/68th
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st  buses temp. rerouted EB: 69th, State and 67th; WB: 67th, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, State and 67th.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at 87th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
